basic.origin: Guangdong, Guangxi, Hainan, Taiwan, India, Malaysia

maintenance.sunlight: In growing season shall be placed in half shade environments, especially in summer avoid direct strong sunlight
maintenance.fertilization: Frequently spary water on leaves in summer and top-dressing low concentration fertilizers, less top-dressing in winter
maintenance.pruning: Pruning timely to keep a good canopy shape
